content:
Here is a more detailed example of a folder structure for an API backend for a comprehensive leave management system:
```
|-- src
    |-- controllers
        |-- leave
            |-- index.js
            |-- request.js
            |-- approval.js
            |-- rejection.js
            |-- history.js
        |-- leavePolicy
            |-- index.js
            |-- create.js
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
            |-- list.js
        |-- leaveType
            |-- index.js
            |-- create.js
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
            |-- list.js
        |-- leaveAccrual
            |-- index.js
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
            |-- list.js
        |-- leaveBalance
            |-- index.js
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
            |-- list.js
        |-- user
            |-- index.js
            |-- create.js
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
            |-- list.js
    |-- models
        |-- leave
            |-- request.js
            |-- approval.js
            |-- rejection.js
            |-- history.js
        |-- leavePolicy
            |-- create.js
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
            |-- list.js
        |-- leaveType
            |-- create.js
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
            |-- list.js
        |-- leaveAccrual
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
            |-- list.js
        |-- leaveBalance
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
            |-- list.js
        |-- user
            |-- create.js
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
            |-- list.js
    |-- routes
        |-- leave
            |-- index.js
            |-- request.js
            |-- approval.js
            |-- rejection.js
            |-- history.js
        |-- leavePolicy
            |-- index.js
            |-- create.js
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
            |-- list.js
        |-- leaveType
            |-- index.js
            |-- create.js
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
            |-- list.js
        |-- leaveAccrual
            |-- index.js
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
            |-- list.js
        |-- leaveBalance
            |-- index.js
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
            |-- list.js
        |-- user
            |-- index.js
            |-- create.js
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
            |-- list.js
    |-- utils
        |-- db.js
        |-- leave
            |-- request.js
            |-- approval.js
            |-- rejection.js
            |-- history.js
        |-- leavePolicy
            |-- create.js
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
            |-- list.js
        |-- leaveType
            |-- create.js
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
            |-- list.js
        |-- leaveAccrual
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
            |-- list.js
        |-- leaveBalance
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
            |-- list.js
        |-- user
            |-- create.js
            |-- update.js
            |-- delete.js
```
